execution_quality: Clean execution with minimal tool use (read and single edit). The agent correctly identified the target file and made a focused change.
work_category: UI layout adjustment to reorder visual elements in a category component.
summary: Agent efficiently completed a straightforward UI reordering task with no complications. The user's immediate pivot to the next feature suggests satisfaction with the work and readiness to continue building.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately moved to next feature request without approval message, indicating acceptance and continuation of iterative work.
